directions: Blend cider vinegar, catsup, white sugar, pimentos, green bell pepper, lemon juice, onion, mustard, and salt in a blender until smooth. Stream olive oil into the vinegar mixture while blending; blend until the dressing emulsifies.
Pour dressing into a bowl, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (2 ounce) jar pimento peppers, drained and chopped
title: Sweet Pepper French Dressing
